about_the_game:
High-quality Jigsaws with lot of features

  • Multiple puzzle pieces selection!

  • Different Cutouts shapes

  • You can sort the puzzle pieces! The puzzle can be divided into 3 parts, 4 parts, or even 9 parts when sorting!

  • You can use Hint - when you pick up a puzzle piece, it draws an approximate area where that piece should be located. Here’s a hint that will help you if you’re stuck and can’t solve the puzzle

  • Auto Solving feature - Places a random puzzle piece in its correct position. It’s really helpful when the puzzle is large and you have no idea where to place the next piece. This will guide you toward the right solution

  • Rotation

  • Useful Zoom to control the whole puzzle surface

  • Magnifier tool

  • Customizable background color

  • Wide cutout range - up to 1000 pieces and more

  • Light UI and Hotkeys feature for easy gameplay

  • Incredible HD pictures, no blurry pieces

  • Relaxing soundtrack

  • Permanent updates of Free Images

  • Holiday Free Events!

We decided to get the opinion of players, and develop high-quality jigsaw puzzles for PC, which will be similar to real puzzles. We've already added a few handy tools to the game, like the Magnifying Glass or Moving the Table, and we've made sure that the picture is not blurry when zooming, but stays as clear as possible.

We'd love to hear what you think of the game, get feedback and maybe some good advice.

Jigsaw puzzle fans, join in!

name: Master of Pieces © Jigsaw Puzzle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 or later with WDDM 1.0 driver
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: 2 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 or later with WDDM 1.0 driver
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

short_description: Free HD Jigsaw Puzzles. Enjoy relaxing atmosphere with this incredible Jigsaws. Thousands of puzzles in one free game—feels like you're solving a real puzzle! Play for free, relax, and catch the vibe with lot of features
